id.description: The ID of the policy priority

agentUpdateStatus.description:
The status of agent updates.

If the status is `onSchedule`, the agent updates automatically according to the policies

agentUpdatePolicy.description:
The version the agent or sensor will update to

> **Tip**
> 
> Get the available versions by sending a request to the `/v3.0/endpointSecurity/versionControlPolicies/agentUpdatePolicies` endpoint.

componentUpdatePolicy.description:
The version that component will update to'.

> **Tip**
>
> `n` indicates the latest version, `n-x` represents x snapshots prior.
> Example: `n-2` represents 2 snapshots prior
